divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on the phone just looking up and at the corner of my eye i see a star like object glide across the sky but in a it looks like at first maybe even a plane until I notice it is zig zagging luckily my sister in law was droping trash in the can and I showed her.then she went to get my brother who had missed it the first sighting but came out again and witnessed the second one about an hour later he witnessed two following each other in the same zig zag pattern also after we could no longer see them in the direction the left small burst of light in the area of departure.as the night went on we could see planes as well but they were bigger and we could see the speed difference from the objects we had seen.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There were no other sightings in Stockton on or around July 2nd 2008
Summary: short zig zag flight across sky
